docs.snippet: Japanese police arrested an American serviceman for alleged drunken driving on Okinawa early Monday morning, days after the lifting of an off-base drinking ban imposed after other alcohol offenses and the arrest of a former Marine in a high-profil...
docs.lead_paragraph: Japanese police arrested an American serviceman for alleged drunken driving on Okinawa early Monday morning, days after the lifting of an off-base drinking ban imposed after other alcohol offenses and the arrest of a former Marine in a high-profile murder case.

headline.main: US Airman Arrested for Alleged Drunken Driving on Okinawa
headline.print_headline: US Airman Arrested for Alleged Drunken Driving on Okinawa
